reviewText:
I'm still very new to graphic arts, but the instruction is so far very useful.  But, you should know that the order for Lesson 2 and Lesson 3 were mixed up, in case you wonder how you've missed a step.  Lesson 3 comes before Lesson 2.

Nevertheless, I'm learning a lot and seeing Aaron's particular work and hearing his careful comments makes me happy I got this as a gift.
